channel.title: Joeocity Project Server Launch
channel.description:
[b] I WANT TO MAKE THIS CLEAR IS THAT THIS IS NOT A ADVERTISEMENT TO COME PLAY ON THE JOEOCITY SERVER[/b]
[center]This is the release of the joeocity project server][/center]
The joeocity project is a project for minor coders like myself to join together and pool there knowledge. This was only a team of 5 that made this server but it is very complex but goes back to the basic. Here are some of the key features.
-Completely Built off of hybridscape source -New game engine -New ban email system connected to email server -Will be host with multiple server -Able to handle multiple worlds and share users -Very adaptable and flexible for change -Anti Exploit System -Able to add grand exchange as soon as I convert the GE source -New user and IRC intergrated system -Much More!
The Server is dated to be up and running in a few weeks but beta testing will start soon. I am not asking for testers so please do not ask.
Things that are still in need of work-
-Engine and Base Server (Finished) -Players Storage (80% done) -Email and IRC server (Finished) -Main Control Server (50% done)
I will post more once the source is finished.
-Joe

I am just notifying everyone that the server will be released soon

item.title: Joeocity Project Server Launch
item.dc:creator: @joeocity joeocity
item.description:
@joeocity wrote:

I WANT TO MAKE THIS CLEAR IS THAT THIS IS NOT A ADVERTISEMENT TO COME PLAY ON THE JOEOCITY SERVER

[center]This is the release of the joeocity project server][/center]

The joeocity project is a project for minor coders like myself to join together and pool there knowledge. This was only a team of 5 that made this server but it is very complex but goes back to the basic. Here are some of the key features.

-Completely Built off of hybridscape source
-New game engine
-New ban email system connected to email server
-Will be host with multiple server
-Able to handle multiple worlds and share users
-Very adaptable and flexible for change
-Anti Exploit System
-Able to add grand exchange as soon as I convert the GE source
-New user and IRC intergrated system
-Much More!

The Server is dated to be up and running in a few weeks but beta testing will start soon. I am not asking for testers so please do not ask.

Things that are still in need of work-

-Engine and Base Server (Finished)
-Players Storage (80% done)
-Email and IRC server (Finished)
-Main Control Server (50% done)

I will post more once the source is finished.

-Joe
